summary: Completed comprehensive testing of V2Ray Bot admin panel. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend Persian RTL interface functional with successful login, navigation, CRUD operations, and settings management.

Plans CRUD operations with price, duration, traffic settings
Settings page with 5 tabs (bot, payment, messages, referral, departments)
Navigation between all pages (orders, payments, tickets, resellers)
